name: Hammer Time!
description:
Our entry to PGG JAM: All Play vol 4.
This game is best played on a custom controller - myoware muscle sensor wired with arduino. Arduino code here:
https://github.com/Brych1/MuscleControll/blob/master/SensorsControl.ino
Authors:
Me(Krystian Brych)
Przemysław Kasprzak
Szymon Gałdyn
